author: TomasKello
body:
This fix addresses the long-standing issue with saving PV validation results in the current working directory instead of specified EOS storage. A recent development of the automated validation workflows using an existing offline validation tool requires this fix.

Tests done:
scram b code-checks
scram b runtests
scram b code-format

**This is backport of [#48746 ](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48746).**
title: [CMSSW_15_0_X] Fix PVmerge to store results in EOS
